thread.title: DC announces first crossover event of All In, We Are Yesterday
thread.title_full: DC announces first crossover event of All In, We Are Yesterday

author: Jackson Luken
title: DC announces first crossover event of All In, We Are Yesterday
text:
The first major crossover of DC’s All In initiative is coming this April in a three-part story titled “ We Are Yesterday “. Writer Mark Waid will be joined by multiple writers and artists as the event spans Batman/Superman: World’s Finest and Justice League Unlimited . It will feature a time-spanning adventure starring some of DC’s most infamous villains, their origins, and how they might connect to the dangers of the present.
The first chapter will debut in Batman/Superman: World’s Finest #38 on April 16 as Batman and Superman face up against Gorilla Grodd. In addition to his psychic powers, Grodd seems to have some sort of knowledge of the future which may or may not be connected to the death of Darkseid.
Part two takes place the next week on April 23 in Justice League Unlimited #6 , written by Mark Waid with art by Travis Moore. The identity of the Inferno Cult is revealed as the League is threatened by some of their most dangerous foes such as Lex Luthor, The Joker, Cheetah.
Finally, the story concludes on April 30 in Batman/Superman: World’s Finest 2025 Annual , written by Mark Waid, Christopher Cantwell, and Morgan Hampton with art by Dan McDaid and Clayton Henry. It will reveal the origins of the Legion of Doom and also feature the World’s Finest debut of the Green Lantern John Stewart.
Batman/Superman: World’s Finest #38 goes on sale April 16, Justice League Unlimited #6 goes on sale April 23, and Batman/Superman: World’s Finest 2025 Annual goes on sale April 30.
